Title: Super WinLock
Description: Super WinLock is a app that works like the Windows 8 Lock Screen, it can help you add the Windows 8 lock screen to your boring windows 7 win lock.
HomeWiki:
Super WinLock is a vb.net project that allows you to have a lock screen like the windows 8 lock screen in your Windows 7 machine. You can use it as screen saver or just for fun.
